item.title: CBT inspired Data Analysis - Part 1
item.description: This blogpost is about applying a mental-wellbeing coping to constant “data analysis worrying”. From https://xkcd.com/1222/. Let’s say you get a new project handed over; some kind of data analysis. What do you feel: excitement of getting your hands onto new data, or anxiety that this project may fail, stumbling upon all the data science mistakes that one can possibly make? I feel both of these things. I am always delighted about a.
